name: Clementine's Nightmare
description:
A prototype for gameplay and theme ideas for the Brackeys 2022.1 Game Jam!
Play as Clementine in a never-ending Nightmare! Each death you awake from a bad dream, only to start all over again! Is this castle even real??

This is extremely rough, and incomplete. However its main purpose it to showcase and test ideas. This is not meant to be a full game. 

Coding done by Purely Useless

Sprites by Oshy_Guy, Astrellical_Arts, AceNX

Music by Mr. C

Concept by Astrellical_Arts

CONTROLS:

Movement & Jump: WASD

Shine Lantern: Space
